page.title: 03ATTRACTIONS:BAD'HAM/DENN'TON
page.content: Community spirit, neighbourliness & friendliness, followed closely by peace & quiet were the main attractions of living in Badingham & Dennington. Other aspects enjoyed were the beauty of the countryside & wildlife, the lack of traffic & pollution, privacy, the unhurried way of life, a sense of identity & identifying with village life, country life & people, village activities, the church, "everything", the absence of street lighting, fresh garden produce, gardens, people's individuality, the pub, trustfulness, the relative security for children & the sense of basic values. According to one household the fact that "we are country people" was sufficient reason for liking village life.
